user.title: Login to FusionSolar
user.description:
# FusionSolarPlus

Please enter your FusionSolar credentials.

For a list of available subdomains click [here](https://support.huawei.com/enterprise/en/doc/EDOC1100165054/dbeb5df3/domain-name-list-of-management-systems), e.g. 'region01eu5'.

 If you wish to control the device, please enable installer access. This is not required if you only want to read data from the device.

 ## Disclaimer 

 If you want to enable installer access please read the disclaimer that can be found [here](https://github.com/JortvanSchijndel/FusionSolarPlus/blob/master/installer_disclaimer.md).

data.installer: Enable installer access. By checking this checkbox I confirm that I have read the installer disclaimer.

data.device_type: What would you like to set up?

data.device_name: Please select an device from your account

error.rate_limit: Captcha API rate limited, please try again in 24 hours.

abort.fetch_error: Could not fetch device list from FusionSolar.
